comments.comment:
List of all the items:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vQRT0EIM3rHgDvMpkGvDxr4JOeueW3GCmoIOKpSA2CUoLq_Srf7yyQ6NBVNJncXIm690JN_WjJbCVHZ/pub
Credit reddit u: Misodent
Felix looks like a proud child showing a tour of his freshly cleaned room to his parents lmao
13:25 Pewds, I'd love to make a custom keyboard for you that has a Japanese layout but matches your whole setup!!

As someone who lived in Japan, I highly suggest getting locks for your stored weights on your weight bench. When an earth quake hits, they will fall off and damage your floors. But your room looks great.
Hard to beat cement blocks for the ultimate gaming surface

what i love the most is that pewds never act like "I'm better than you" kind of way.
He's acting exactly like my bro showing me his new setup and being excited about it.
I like how Felix is basically the mum who’s getting everyone to clean up their setup and cables and they’re actually doing it
Felix just looks really goddamn happy and it gives away such positive vibes. good job on everything man

It boggles my mind for how much money Felix makes. How many crazy expensive things he can buy but here he is with his modest, humble set up. A simple desk. Simple screens. Simple shelf. Simple everything. There's no flexing of wealth. There's no "omg look at all this stuff i own". I watch any other youtuber that does this type of video and I feel like im being talked down to. But watching this makes me feel great.

It fills my heart with joy when Felix just says things like "hey lets get her a nice chair" and just goes through with it. You can see he really is happy to make others happy, happy with what he does and where he is. I have learned so much about happiness here, i have become so much more happy in the last years, its incredible. Thank you for reading advice. Thank you for teaching me to appreciate what i have. For the last year i have just been so happy with everything.
I like the theme of just having everything you need in one room. Also, leveling up strength, dexterity and intelligence at the same time, perfectly balanced, as all things should be.
For the speaker blocking the door problem, you can install a sliding door instead of the regular one, it won't be blocked as much, it's a nice small build project and japanese aesthetic very nice
felix i’m so happy for you :) you’re absolutely thriving , and i love seeing how proud & happy  you are in these kinds of videos <3

Him explaining the stats on his computer:
“The motherboard contains motherboard”

Well said pewds, well said
For the door to the "closet" just have either sliding doors or no doors for the space. Saves so much space and looks fantastic. Easy, quick and cheap solution!

You could remove the closet doors and have it as a "walk in" shelfing area. It would help connect the gym area too, could store some of the gym stuff in the closet. Get some bands or different lifting accessories hanging. Also would allow you to put the gym mats down without the door
17:29 as a audiophile I respect him allot for buying high-end audio I think those b&o speakers are around $30,000 usd
pretty slick for 7 billion - my 8 billion dollar setup blows it out of the water of course

For those dresser doors, if you're allowed to you could:
1) remove the doors entirely, or
2) change the doors into a sliding ones. Kinda like those you see from traditional Japanese homes
The new set up seems more mature and down-to-earth. Really fits with the theme of Felix's chill wholesome vlogs. Absolutely love it!
honestly that room is a dream setup. he literally has everything he needs, even his pets
Honestly the sheer convenience of having a workout area in the same room as your PC setup is genious af.
This setup is actual goals

For those wondering about the books turned around at 19:01 the black book with red at the bottom right is A History of Central Banking and the Enslavement of Mankind, to its left is The 4-Hour Work Week followed by 48 Laws of Power, the big green book flipped on the top shelf is Revolt Against the Modern World by Evola.

You’re right, eggshell foam does basically nothing. It dampens some of the high range frequencies, but leaves the rest of the them to go wild. Most bedrooms have low/mid range issues and getting rid of the high end just makes them more pronounced. If you get what they call “full broadband” acoustic treatment you can get a somewhat tamed room. you’re right again a broadcast microphone like the EV mic you’re using has great ambient rejection and as long as it’s close to your mouth you won’t hear much of the room as shown in this video.

I like this setup. It's clean and sleek, and allows flexibility for future upgrades. You could do more for the room using some strategically placed artworks than using sound-proofing, and there is amazing art in Japan that would complement the room. But obviously you've put a heck of a lot of thought into the layout, because it works so well.

The taste on every single part of the room is amazing, it really reflects your personality. With the doors I had a similar issue with the space on the closets in my house so I change them for sliding doors, I believe that could also help you with the space and maybe if you use sliding doors with a japanese style this might help to the aesthetic of the room too.
It really shows that you love this setup u made and the fact that you present it in such a humble way, makes me be happy for you and not jealous. Much love <3

What I love about Felix is his humility and his need to justify his spending. He's successful and wealthy as a result of his years of work but still feels a need to justify buying expensive speakers or cars to his audience (and maybe to himself?). In a world of gross YouTubers and Instagrammers flaunting their wealth all the time it's so lovely and refreshing to see. Go and buy the nice things you want Pewds - it's okay with us!

i love how much happier Felix seems in his videos now that they’re finally in Japan. there’s such a light in his eyes and seeing his smile warms my heart! i have been subbed and watching since i was 17 and have loved watching him progress and grow as a youtuber and person overall. truly my favorite gamer and youtuber hands down. 

you’re amazing, Pewds! i really hope you continue to do what makes you happy ️
I love how excited Felix is he's like an excited little kid who's so proud and it makes me so happy
As someone very deep in the fitness industry - it is genuinely so nice to hear felix talk about fitness. idk what it is, its just so wholesome

I love how humble Felix is. He has all the money in the world to spend and he still likes to save. I know it also comes from culture and how he is raised but props to him for continuing to be such a humble person ️

being a 21 year old makes me a 'long time bro' subbed for 10 years plus and i think everyone can agree that felixs' channel has made a generation and a half of people happy, thanks felix for keeping it real for so so long

It’s like Felix has won interneting. I believed social media to be like Hollywood in that either you eventually burn out or survive long enough to become the villain. This guy has been through so much and still engages with his massive audience. I’m taking notes on how to build a non toxic community.
I had no idea they moved to Japan. Re: that door that can't open, a possible solution would be to install that door as a slider instead of swing-open?
Love how humble Felix is and how he has his own life separate from his channel.
Felix's positivity makes me feel good about the world too. He just seem so happy and it rubs off on me.
Judge Ken's setup. Please Felix. Every one of your collabs give me life, and you know that you two roasting each other's setups would give us 4 hours of content
I like the best thing about him is that, he never say that he's better, he is happy with what he just have and shows he's all stff very excitedly

i love how these updates of japan are just felix,marzia and the pugs living their daily lives,and doing normal human things.I also appreciate your love to the pugsand marzia,i see alot of content creators today that use the people /things they love for veiws.Felix i hope your living your best life,you deserve it :) 

PS: sorry for any spelling errors i made.

For a very rich person, that is a very humble set up. I like how pewds is content with his own setup. This is as an example that it doesn't have to be so grand and posh all the time. As long as you like it and you are satisfied with it then that is the best set up. KUDOS TO YOUR SET UP PWEDS! It's cozy and it's you.

Neat set up. Planning my future gaming room and my boys said PewDiePie has a new gaming chair which suits my white house. I've added it to my shopping list. Thanks for the minimalistic hidden cable ideas!  Work and fitness stuff in the same area would save me so much time.

1:06 The foam padding on the walls are meant to stop reflections and yes, they're useless in this instance. Those pads would help a Sound Engineer doing critical work. The difference won't be noticeable on a microphone recording youtube videos
That home gym setup looks amazing.

Love the balance between being a minimalist and not wasting space. So many people just put one thing across an entire wall and then never use it because its too empty and awkward. 

Also love the timid hands behind the back like hes showing his mom that he cleaned his room.
I think within the next 10 months Felix will accidently destroy his monitors w weights.
10:00 I lost my tears when i see Dark souls 3 and Elden ring together on his desktop.
Yep, i'm ashamed about my setup when I watch videos like this :P Looks very good Pewds!
This feels like a more relaxed workspace for felix as he becomes more relaxed in his content and begins to lean toward retirement and perusing what he enjoys
Quite a minimalist set up which is always clean, pleasing to the eyes and wonderful to work and play in. Great job! And definitely an upgrade.
7:13  is a YouTuber called Fracno’s set up! I’m not sure if he actually posted his set up for Felix to react to but thought I’d let y’all know that is Fracno’s !
Almost missed this upload! But I'm glad I didn't, Felix gives away such positive vibes it really made my day!
Felix really maximized that space

I would recommend, if you have the time and tools, you can install a sliding door 11:00 for that storage closet, so you don't have to worry about the space for opening it. <3
as always love the videos and vlogs!
Imagine the workout sets he does after a gaming session, incredible

I don't think the weight set looks weird at all! It looks professional and shows you are prioritizing ur health.  Seeing it in front of u everyday and so close to ur desk will allow so many more opportunities to stretch your body throughout work. I also adore the hobby set up. It's so nice to see u putting things together in a way that promotes your self care. It places the set up importance on how it can serve u instead of how it can serve the audience.

Honestly your set ups are made around you and that’s what I love. Seen all your setups through the year and it changes to fit how you feel and want it to be. 
Been watching you since I was 12, I’m 21 now!
it's always nice to see cables being put in places where the room won't look cluttered and everything looks organized.
19:10 The fact Moby Duck had to be censored lmao
17:45 Hej Monika makes another comeback

I simultaneously love/hate designing a space. Love the creativity, hate the anxiety. 

The best part is what you're enjoying now. Knowing it's perfect, maybe 1 or 2 things that aren't and drive you crazy. But it's clean, it's yours. 

Love the dark grey/slate mixed with the wood. Great combo, perfect for Japan. We'll see what new mood you're in 2 years from now!
Let's GO! That's my gunpla desk at 7:12 - thanks for sharing your thoughts!

I love that you shared all of the setups. I really need help with cable management lol. My work desk has all these docks and switches and it's annoying. You did a great job with yours. I love that after all these years your channel has just stayed down to earth and wholesome. Congrats on the new space!
A proper barbell really does make leg day 100x better, new squat and deadlift personal bests feel so awesome
I’m glad to see that even after spending lots of money moving to Japan pewds still has enough money to drop another billion on his setup. True gamer.
My favorite thing about this video is how happy he looks showing us everything
6:01 Pewdiepie pronouncing "Gay Balls" the right way
I would consider upgrading doors to the sliding ones. You lose some space for the mechanism, but you dont have to deal with annoying doors

I feel like adding greens (fake or organic plants) to his room would make it a lot better, but don't get me wrong it already looks amazing and comfy, not to mention am a huge fan of the cable management..

This setup is legit so aesthetically pleasing, I feel like people don't recognize enough how good Pewds is at decorating. I remember even in his Animal Crossing tour he would say that his town wasn't very good but it was sooo cute and cohesive

I really really enjoy pewds channel just overflowing with wholesomeness and love and support. Its such a great kind of “retirement” but also just being a passionate hobby for him and his feelings towards his videos really shows and bleeds to his fans as well. I think everyone enjoys it.
I love these types of videos, I really feel like you’re talking to me. You’re set up is amazing, you did the best with what you got and I’m glad you’re happy
IT LOOKS SO GOOD! Cable management is perfect and black on white setup looks minimal which I like a lot.
Room looks so good! I don't know if you'd like this design Pewds, but you could replace the cupboard doors with ones that slide or fold to minimise the amount of room needed to open them!
Some sliding doors on the closets would probably help with the limited floor mat space and door not opening situations! This looks awesome Pewds thanks for showing us!

Pewds: Look at my awesome new life! No cables! Custom chair! Weights!
Sive: so worried about censorship he took the time to blur out Moby Dick (19:09).
The sigma male grind set had me rolling
Gym bro here, please face the other way when you squat! Much safer if you face the “bar-catchers” and can just lean towards it to rack off

Would it be too much of a hassle to get a house tour when everything is ready? I know this is a big request and a possible invasion of privacy but im genuinely so curious as to how Japanese homes look and how you guys decorated. Again don't even bother if you think it's bothersome. 
Thank you for hearing me and possibly other people out on this! :)
I laughed when he said I'm Swedish, No hospitality for guests. It's such a weird custom and I'm glad he poked fun at it.
2:48 with pewdiepie

For the door problem, is there a way to replace the doors for foldy doors? You know, that just zig zag fold like a fancy hand fan. That way you can still get in without needing the space to open the doors. 

Love your videos always, thank you for all you share!️
19:00 poor Moby Deeck got censored
It all looks great. I'm reminded that I really enjoyed the Book Club/Book Review that you used to do. I think it would be a nice cozy room to do that in
When did PewDiePie become so happy constantly? That's not the standard Nordic mood.
His setup is actually extremely clean. Form and function, perfection.
When re-doing my room I thought to myself: "make pewds proud of your cables."

I don’t watch as much anymore but when I do I am always reminded of how much joy and laughter you brought me as a child when I first found your channel back when you played Deadpool 8 years ago. keep it up, your the best
@Pewdiepie,  you know you can get some painter's tape and tape up the spot where you'd put the Acoustic Panel Adhesive.

i remember watching felix when i was in elementary. i ate the 50 chocolates that i was supposed to sell while binge watching his play throughs. now i’ve graduated with a BA and i’m into weight lifting rn as well. felix’s content is wholesome and it’s my safe haven when i’m anxious
For pewds the cables are the most important. Can you imagine him dying under a barbell doing squats and he's constantly thinking of how bad the cables are managed
Dude radiates so much positivity and happy energy that i genuinely feel happy for myself waytching him!!!!
There's room eco that is really noticable in the video. You should look into do some stealth sound dampening. It would also help alot with improving the sound from the speakers.
6:42 ULTRA MEGA GIGA CHAD SETUP
Pewdipie is the perfect YouTuber to watch while eating
Felix is a very nice man and we wish him luck.Greetings from Azerbaijan
